title.en: A Prayer to Recall the Sublime Masters who Showed Great Kindness to the Land of Snows

text.en: All the infinite buddhas of the ten directions, together with their heirs,
text.en-trans: rabjam chok chü gyal dang dé sé tsok

text.en: The arhats, patriarchs and great sthaviras,
text.en-trans: drachom té rab neten ché nam dang

text.en: Six ornaments of this world,1two marvellous ācāryas,2and the rest—
text.en-trans: dzamling gyen druk mejung lobpön sok

text.en: All the paṇḍitas and siddhas of the noble land, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: pakyul pendrub nam la solwa deb

text.en: Padmākara who embodied an ocean of Three Root deities,
text.en-trans: tsa sum gyatsö ngowo pema jung

text.en: The bodhisattva and great abbot, Śāntarakṣita,
text.en-trans: changchub sempa khenchen zhiwatso

text.en: And Lord Tri Songdetsen, whose kindness to the Snowy Land is without equal—
text.en-trans: gangchen kadrin nyammé trisong jé

text.en: To these three pioneers of the teachings, I pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé sol jé sum la solwa deb

text.en: Vima,3Thönmi,4Songtsen,5Bairo,6
text.en-trans: bi ma tönmi song tsen bai ro dang

text.en: Ma,7Nyak,8Ka,9Chok,10Gyalse Chokdrup Gyalpo,11
text.en-trans: ma nyak ka chok gyalsé chok drub gyal

text.en: Tsogyal,12Namkhai Nyingpo and the rest—the king and his subjects—
text.en-trans: tsogyal namnying lasok jebang la

text.en: Bringing to mind your kindness, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: kadrin drenpé ngang né solwa deb

text.en: Lord Tri Ralpachen, glorious Dīpaṃkara,13
text.en-trans: ngadak tri ral palden marmé dzé

text.en: Rinchen Zangpo,14Yeshe Ö,15Dromtönpa,16
text.en-trans: rin zang yeshe ö dang dromtönpa

text.en: Gongpa Rabsal,17Lumé,18Naktso,19
text.en-trans: gongpa rabsal lu mé nak tso dang

text.en: And the great Ngok Lotsāwa—to you all I pray!
text.en-trans: ngok lo chenpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Drokmi,20Khukpa Lhetsé,21the great and benevolent Kunga Nyingpo,22
text.en-trans: drokmi khuk lhetsé chen künga nying

text.en: Chökyi Lodrö,23Khyungpo Naljor,24
text.en-trans: chökyi lodrö khyungpo naljor dang

text.en: Smṛtijñānakīrti, Śākyaśrī25and the rest—
text.en-trans: smiti jnana shakya shiri sok

text.en: To the sovereigns of the teachings, I pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé ngadak nam la solwa deb

text.en: So,26Zur,27Nub,28Nyang,29and Dam, Tsang and Jam,30
text.en-trans: so zur nub nyang dam tsang jam sum dang

text.en: Sangye Lama,31Chöwang,32Lord Gödem,33
text.en-trans: sangye lama chö wang gödem jé

text.en: Lingpa Nüden,34and the rest in all the hosts of terma lineages—
text.en-trans: lingpa nüden lasok tergyü tsok

text.en: To the vidyādharas of kama and terma, I pray!
text.en-trans: kater rigdzin nam la solwa deb

text.en: Milarepa, Rechung Dorje Drak,35
text.en-trans: mila ré dang ré chung dorjé drak

text.en: Drakpa Gyaltsen,36Gyalwa Yangönpa,37
text.en-trans: drakpa gyaltsen gyalwa yang gönpa

text.en: Götsangpa,38Tsöndrü Zangpo39and the rest—
text.en-trans: götsangpa dang tsöndrü zangpo sok

text.en: To the lords of siddhas, I pray!
text.en-trans: drubpé wangchuk nam la solwa deb

text.en: Drimé Özer,40Butön Rinchen Drup,41
text.en-trans: drimé özer butön rinchen drub

text.en: Dharma lord Dolpopa,42Lama Dampa,43
text.en-trans: chöjé dolpo lama dampa dang

text.en: Gyalse Tokme,44Kunga Zangpo45and the rest—
text.en-trans: gyalsé tokmé künga zangpo sok

text.en: To the peerless holders of the teachings, I pray!
text.en-trans: dadral tendzin nam la solwa deb

text.en: Chökyi Zangpo,46Sakya Paṇḍita,47
text.en-trans: chökyi zangpo sakya pandita

text.en: Omniscient Yaktön,48Sheja Kunrig,49
text.en-trans: künkhyen yak tön sheja künrik dang

text.en: Shönnu Lodrö,50Lobzang Drakpa51and the rest—
text.en-trans: zhönnu lodrö lobzang drakpa sok

text.en: To the founts of knowledge, I pray!
text.en-trans: rigpé jungné nam la solwa deb

text.en: Chögyal Pakpa,52the Karmapa bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: chögyal pak dang changsem karma pa

text.en: Pakmodrupa,53Zhang,54Lobzang Gyatso55and the rest—
text.en-trans: pakdru zhang dang lobzang gyatso sok

text.en: To the great beings who brought happiness to beings
text.en-trans: gangchen ten drö dekyi pel dzepé

text.en: And aided the teachings in the Land of Snows, I pray!
text.en-trans: sempa chenpo nam la solwa deb

text.en: Gö Lotsawa Shönnu Pal,56Pema Wangyal,57
text.en-trans: gö lo zhönnu palden pema wang

text.en: Losal Gyatso,58Jamgön Nesarwa,59
text.en-trans: losal gyatso jamgön né sarwa

text.en: Khyentse Wangpo,60Lodrö Thaye61and the rest—
text.en-trans: khyentsé wangpo lodrö tayé sok

text.en: To the holders of the non-sectarian teachings, I pray!
text.en-trans: rimé tendzin nam la solwa deb

text.en: Through the power of praying with unshakeable devotion in this way,
text.en-trans: detar miché güpé soltab tü

text.en: May I receive the inspiration and blessings of these noble beings,
text.en-trans: dampa nam kyi jinlab jukpa dang

text.en: May all the twofold obscurations of beings—myself and others—be purified,
text.en-trans: dakzhen drowé drib nyi kün jang né

text.en: And may we all attain the state of Vajradhara!
text.en-trans: dorjé chang gi gopang nyur tob shok

text.en: May the lives of the supreme holders of the teachings remain secure for a hundred aeons,
text.en-trans: tendzin chok nam zhabpé kal gyar ten

text.en: May the doctrine of study and practice spread throughout the world,
text.en-trans: shé dang drubpé tenpa sateng khyab

text.en: May a new golden era of perfect fortune dawn,
text.en-trans: kalzang dzokden sarpé gatön ché

text.en: And may it never disappear but remain forever more!
text.en-trans: nubmé yün ring taktu char gyur chik
